title: PBE Installation fail
body: When I tried to install PBE on my computer, It made it to 50% then hit an error. When I retired to download, it checked 154 files before giving the error again. What is going on?

replies.body:
There may be a few issues happening here.  The initial error at 50% may be due to a connection issue, where the patcher is failing to connect to the patching server to download files.  For this, I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get that fixed.

Receiving an error during file scanning can caused by a security setting with your OS that's blocking the patcher from scanning your game files for corruption.  You can use our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and make sure that the patcher has permission.  Let me know if you have any questions!
